name: Flavo Pastor
description:
The time for Pastor revival is nigh...

Destroy him in this unique fusion of Racing game with Reverse Tower Defense before he destroys you!
Watch out for His demonic Towers - they slow you down and make annihilating Pastor even harder!

Game supports both Single &  Multi Player modes.
In 1 Player mode your task is to finish 3 Laps with the best time.
In 2 Players mode both players compete for the first place!

Default Controls:
Keyboard:
WSAD - Car's movement
Spacebar - Handbrake

Gamepad:
Left Analog - Car's steering
Right Analog - Camera's movement
Right Trigger - Acceleration
Left Trigger - Brake
Xbox's B Button - Handbrake

Credits:
Mateusz Ptasiński
Mariusz Sielicki
Adam Bąk
Natalia Wylezińska
Marek Kurzaj
Mateusz Nagórka
